title: Halloween
description: Let there be fright! We're celebrating your favorite scary holiday on Saturday, October 27th at Prospect Lounge. Join us from 9pm to close for a Halloween night filled with drink specials, costume contests and dancing. No cover!

banner_image.name: PH_Halloween_937x400
banner_image.alt: Padre: artwork with orange background and black skull. Text reads "Fright Night Halloween 2018"

short_description: Let there be fright! We're celebrating your favorite scary holiday on Saturday, October 27th at Prospect Lounge with a spooky Halloween party.
